# Introduction

AI is transforming the way we work, think, and create—but are you making the most of it? Our **Gen AI Workshop Series**, led by Dr. Alexei Karas and Lina Mooren, is designed to help you integrate AI into your daily tasks with **practical, hands-on sessions**. One lunch time a week from now until Week 15, we will be exploring a **new AI use case**—from writing emails and brainstorming ideas to enhancing research, automating workflows, and more. Whether you’re a beginner or already experimenting with AI, these sessions will give you the tools to **work smarter, save time, and boost your creativity**. Sessions will be hybrid—attendees can join in-person or via the Teams link provided in the table below, no sign-ups necessary. We hope to see you there!
